channel.title: Client simple problem just look very need help
channel.description:
hey can u help me please u know when u login with your client in server u ussually have 2 options
USERNAME::
PASSWORD:
but how can i add this to the client
IP:
PORT:
to make that i can type any ip..please help [img]http://file:///C:/Users/Denis/Desktop/Capture_1.JPEG[/img]

item.title: Client simple problem just look very need help
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

In Client.java find

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "Password: " + Class50.method588(aString1174, 0) + ((anInt1216 == 1) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "|" : ""), j);

And below j += 15; add

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "Server IP: " + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "Port: " + port + ((anInt1216 == 3) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15;

Next time post in client help not server help.

Read full topic
item.source: Client simple problem just look very need help
